name: Pirates Cove
description:
Fight pirates and collect weapons, coins, and treasure in this pixelated 2D shooter! There are three levels, but two ways to complete the game. Find them :)

This was a game made for the 21st LMOB Jam, it was made by three people :

NightFury3000

Chrid

Maggiethegsd

We had a ton of fun making this in 5 days, we went through a lot of times with this project, including sleepless nights to frustrating problems, to big achievements! This was one of our first jams, and we all hope you like the game very much. There are some bugs we are aware of, but couldn't fix during the time frame. Sorry :D

Donate to us if you feel like we deserve one :)

Dev Itch : 

Chrid : https://itch.io/profile/chridamid

Maggiethegsd : https://itch.io/profile/maggiethegsd
